description:
Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

Translations between the following languages are supported:
Abkhaz, Acehnese, Acholi, Afar, Afrikaans, Albanian, Alur, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Avar, Awadhi, Aymara, Azerbaijani, Balinese, Baluchi, Bambara, Baoulé, Bashkir, Basque, Batak Karo, Simple but powerful Japanese-English, English-Japanese dictionary app. 

The app's features include:

● Over 170.000 dictionary entries with readings and english meaning
● Over 6.500 kanji characters with stroke order
● Over 730.000 Japanese names, place names and institution names
● Over 147.000 example sentences with translation

● Instantaneous search results

● Character input by kanji and kana handwriting recognition. Recognition algorithm can handle wrong stroke order and small mistakes.
● When multiple similar characters are found, you don't need to redo drawing after each character - just long  press to see a preview
● Search by kanji radicals (for example 日 and 月 will find 明)
● Wildcard search - "*" can replace any number of characters and "?" can replace any single character. Works both with English and Japanese words.
● Search by kanji, kana and romaji - "じしょ", "じsho" and "jisho" will give the same search results

● Kanji lists by JLPT level and school grade (1 - 6)
● Multiple word lists divided by subject, grammatical function, JLPT level and more

In this globalized world, overcoming language barriers has become more important. Our Translate Ease is committed to providing you with accurate and fast translation services, allowing you to easily solve any language translation problems you need, no matter where you are.

Applicable scenarios:
Travel: Whether it is a restaurant menu, traffic signs, or interactions with locals, the translation app can help you quickly understand.
Business: When communicating with multinational companies and customers, the translation app allows you to easily handle emails, documents, and calls in various languages.
Learning: A must-have for partners learning new languages, translate words, phrases, and sentences anytime, anywhere to accelerate the language learning process.
Daily life: Translate shopping tags, recipes, news, etc. to help you better understand content in different languages.

Why choose us?
High accuracy: Using advanced translation algorithms to ensure accurate translation results.
User-friendly: The simple interface design makes it easy for you to get started and quickly find the functions you need.
Fast and efficient translation experience, easily cope with various scenarios such as daily conversations, business emails, travel routes, etc.
Voice translation function allows you to speak the language directly without typing, and the application will instantly recognize and translate, bringing a smoother communication experience.

Let communication without borders, experience seamless global communication. Download the Translate Ease app now and make every communication simple and hassle-free!

In a digital era which brings the whole world to your fingertips if you are online, here is something to save you in a connectivity crisis! Welcome to the Sinhala Dictionary Offline, a FREE English to Sinhala / Sinhala to English Dictionary with a database of more than 200,000 words. If you are on a travel to Sri Lanka or living in a poor internet access area, this is a must have app and a user-friendly tool to keep your life and work going. Dependence on the internet could cost you and the Sinhala Dictionary Offline is the best solution for you!

Main Features

* No internet connection required (works offline) 
* Over 200,000 Sinhala / English definitions
* Spelling suggestions 
* Word Predictions
* Displays definitions in Sinhala
* English Transliteration
* Search History
* Sinhala to English Dictionary
* Type Sinhala words phonetically using Roman characters 
* No Sinhala font installation required
* English / Sinhala Pronunciation 
* Translator (Requires a data connection)



For all who have eagerly waited for updates and new features, a new translation service has been introduced. This requires an internet connection and has been compiled based on 3rd party sources.


Learn the English meaning of ... or What could .... mean in English' are your questions, this is the ideal and easiest tool to have anytime, anywhere on your Apple iPhone.

The free dictionary app contains advertisements and options to share content via social media.

Kindly provide your feedback whenever you use this app and support me to make it just the way you need it. Hope to get back to you soon with more to help your translations further.

description:
In today's era, having a good body is the most important wealth of a person, so we must always pay attention to our physical health.
Blood sugar tracker-AI health helps everyone record their blood sugar and form statistical data and summary. After measuring blood sugar in life, users can enter the measurement results into our application. Please rest assured that we will only use your results for statistics and will protect the privacy of users.

Having a good body is the premise of everything.
Features:
1. Support multiple languages to serve global users
2. Blood sugar data support entry
3. Popular science of blood sugar related knowledge
4. Health data privacy and security

Disclaimer
This application is designed to provide users with routine health services such as blood sugar data recording and blood sugar knowledge. It should be clear that all content provided by this application does not constitute any medical diagnosis, treatment plan or health guidance advice, nor can it replace the diagnosis, treatment and advice of professional doctors or other healthcare professionals. If you are outside this application, please be sure to consult a professional doctor and follow the doctor's arrangements before making any medical decisions.

Build a stronger connection with your Deen, one day at a time.

Staying consistent with prayer. Making time to read even one verse a day. Remembering to say Alhamdulillah when life gets heavy. These are the habits that build Iman, and Muslim Pro is here to help you build them.

Whether you’re navigating faith at college, raising a family, or rediscovering prayer, Muslim Pro walks with you, every day, in every season of your Iman.

Designed to help you grow in faith:
- Prayer reminders (Athan) tailored to your location, helping you never miss a Salah
- Daily Quran goals to keep you reading and reflecting
- Track your progress with streaks, reminders, and reflections
- Guided Duas & Azkar, chosen for real-life moments
- Personalised Islamic content that fits your journey, your pace
- Discover halal spots & mosques nearby, even while travelling.
- Learn through short videos, articles & tips, no pressure, just progress

The Complete Qur’an Experience
- All 114 Surahs with audio recitations by renowned Qaris like Mishari Alafasy and Abdul Basit
- Word-by-word translations in English and other languages
- Tajweed color guides and recitation tips to improve your fluency
- Last read verse bookmarks & Ayah highlights
- Memorization mode with repetition, verse selection, and audio speed control
- Light & dark modes, font size adjustments for easier reading
- Verse, Surah, or keyword search
- Authentic Arabic script with Uthmani calligraphy
- Short Tafsir to help reflect on meaning
- Daily Ayah reminders to stay spiritually connected

Small steps lead to lasting change. Muslim Pro helps you stay motivated, feel accountable, and keep growing in your faith, day by day.


Unlock the full Muslim Pro Experience with Premium
Ad-Free Experience: Enjoy uninterrupted access to all features.
Exclusive Tools: Access offline reading, audio recitations, customizable prayer widgets, and interactive lessons.

Premium Subscription Plans
$12.99 per month
$34.99 per year

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing may vary in other countries, and charges may be converted to your local currency.
Subscriptions renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscription and auto-renewal settings in your Apple account.

Supported Languages
Muslim Pro is available in multiple languages, including English, Bahasa Indonesia, Bahasa Melayu, Français, العربية, اردو, and more.

Pro Tips for the Best Experience:
Keep the app updated for the most accurate prayer times and reading features.
Enable auto-location to adjust prayer notifications based on your area.
Open the app daily for seamless access to verified prayer times, Qibla tools, a prayer space finder, and a Halal restaurant finder.

Bible Chat: Built for Christians Who Want to Hear God in the Noise of Everyday Life

Have you made time for God’s Word today? Join millions of believers who’ve chosen the #1 faith app in the world. Download Bible Chat today!

Life is noisy. Fast. Overwhelming. Even when you’re trying to stay close to God, it’s easy to feel spiritually disconnected.

Bible Chat is the ultimate all-in-one Christian app designed to make Bible reading, prayer, and Christian community a part of your everyday life. It is for Christians who want peace - real peace - anchored in Scripture.


Whether you're a lifelong Christian or just starting your journey, Bible Chat gives you everything you need to:

• Understand the Bible Better - Learn what the Bible really means with helpful guides and simple explanations that make God's Word easier to follow and apply.

• Grow Your Prayer Habit - Build a consistent prayer routine supported by daily  inspiration and the power of a praying community.

• Make Faith Part of Your Day - Improve your daily routine with spiritual prompts, Christian calendar reminders, and faith tools designed for the whole family.

• Support Your Mental Health - Find peace and calm in moments of stress with simple tools that help you refocus on God’s strength.

• Make Faith Fun and Interactive - Enjoy fun and easy ways to learn, think, and talk about how faith fits into your everyday life.


Key Features to Explore:

• Daily Plan: Stay on track with your faith. Follow a simple daily plan that helps you grow closer to God, one step at a time.

• Structured Bible Study Plans: Follow simple Bible reading plans made for real life. Some of the topics include: healing, wisdom, leadership, grief, and more.

•  Holy Calendar: See important Christian days in a monthly view. Never miss a feast, saint day, or holy event again.

• Panic Button: Struggling with stress or temptation? Tap the Panic Button for guided deep breathing exercises that calm the mind and provide anxiety relief.

• Live Prayer: Share your prayer intentions, and let's pray together to grow closer to God.

• Send a Blessing:  Send a Bible verse with a kind message straight to a friend’s phone. Add a heart or doodle to make it personal and uplifting.

• Bible Stories for Kids: Turn screen time into faith time! Show fun, Bible-based stories and videos to your kids.

• Multiple Bible Versions: Read the Bible the way you like best. Choose from NKJV, KJV, WMB, FBV, World English Bible, Amplified, and NASB.

• Bible Verse Widget: See a new Bible verse every day, right on your lock screen or home screen.

• Bible Trivia: Challenge and enhance your biblical knowledge through interactive trivia games.

• Verse Locator: Looking for a verse? Search and find it fast, along with what it means.

• Personalized Devotionals & Prayers: Start your day with custom devotionals and write your own prayers to stay closer to God.

• Biblical Character Profiles: Learn about the people in the Bible: their stories, struggles, and how God worked in their lives.

• Let's Discuss Faith: Join honest chats about how faith connects to your real life - like work, family, and relationships.


Experience More with Premium:
Unlock unlimited conversations, full access to every feature, and exclusive designs for your Daily Prayer Widgets. Start with a FREE 7-day trial, then choose our weekly plan at £4.99 or opt for extended plans for greater savings.


Privacy Policy & Terms and Conditions:
https://thebiblechat.com/privacy-policy/
https://thebiblechat.com/terms-and-conditions/


Join Our Thriving Community:
Join a friendly community of people who love God or are just starting to learn. With Bible Chat and the new Send a Blessing Widget, you can make Bible verses and prayer part of your everyday conversations.

Quran Majeed is an amazing Quran app that beautifies your life with the blessing of reading and listening to the Quran on the go. The latest version of the authentic Quran Majeed app for iPhone and iPad offers complete Quran in the elegant Uthmanic script, audio recitation, translations and English Tafsir Uthmani, proofread by a Muslim scholar ('alim).
القرآن المجيد هو تطبيق مميز للقرآن الذي يجمل حياتك ببركة القراءة والاستماع إلى القرآن أثناء التنقل. الإصدار الأخير من تطبيق القرآن المجيد لأجهزة الآي فون والآيباد تقدم قرآنًا كاملاً في الكتابة العثمانية الأنيقة، وتلاوة الصوت، والترجمات، والتفاسير، وقام بمراجعته أحد العلماء

● Worldwide Prayer Times clock with Azan/Adhan alarm options. Supports different prayer time calculation methods. Qibla direction. Ramadan Sehar/Iftar times
أوقات الصلاة لجميع أنحاء العالم مع خيار تنبيه الأذان، ودعم طرق مختلفة لحساب أوقات الصلاة، وبوصلة القبلة، وأوقات السحور والإفطار

● World famous reciters (Sheikh Abdul Basit, Sheikh As Sudays & As Shraym, Mishari Rashid, Saad Al Ghamdi, Abu Bakr Shatry, Sheikh Ahmed Ajmi, Sheikh Al-Huzaifi, Sheikh Mahir-al-Muayqali, Sheikh Minshawi, Sheikh Ayub, Khalil Husari, Mahmood AlBana, Salah Bukhatir & Sheikh Basfar).
تلاوات القراء المعروفون عالميا.

● Four English translations (Pickthal, Dr. Mohsin, Mahmood & Yusuf Ali) and forty-five language translations (AlBanian, Amazigh, Amharic, Azerbaijani, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Chinese, Divehi, Dutch, French, German, Hausa, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malayalam, Malaysian, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Sindhi, Somali, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Tartar, Turkish, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek). 

● Option to display any translation along with full Arabic text in hi-resolution, Retina graphics in both portrait and landscape viewing. Supports pinch/zoom feature for changing font size.
خيار عرض أي ترجمة مع النص العربي الكامل بالدقة الممتازة في وضعي الأفقي والعمودي، دعم ميزة التصغير / التكبير لتغيير حجم الخط.

● Islamic greeting messages (Eid Mubarak, Ramadan Kareem, ...)
رسائل معايدة إسلامية (عيد مبارك، رمضان كريم، ...)

● Qibla Direction — اتجاه القبلة

● Hijri Converter — تحويل التاريخ

● Quran TV feature with beautiful background videos
تلفزيون القرآن مع مقاطع فيديو خلفية جميلة

● Visual Quran feature with flip gesture
المصحف المرئي مع إيماءة التقليب

● Watch live coverage of Makkah & Madinah.
شاهد التغطية المباشرة لمكة المكرمة والمدينة المنورة.

● Selectable themes (Green, Blue, Classic-Green, Night Mode, Light & Brown).
إمكانية اختيار الثيمات (أخضر، أزرق، الوضع الليلي، فاتح، بني)

● Advanced audio options to help with memorization (repetition of ayah, Surah, number of repetitions, interval, and recitation speed).
خيارات الصوت المتقدمة للمساعدة في الحفظ (تكرار الآية، وسورة، وعدد من حالات التكرار، وفاصل، وسرعة التلاوة).

● Highly advanced “Search” feature that can help with searching any word (search exact word, affixes or all roots) in the Arabic text, any of the translations and English Tafsir.
ميزة بحث متقدم يساعد في البحث عن أي كلمة ( الكلمة بالضبط، كل اللاحقات أو الجذور) في النص العربي، والترجمات والتفاسير

● Bookmarking of Aya, translation and tafsir (supports iCloud synchronization that helps your bookmarks stay up to date on all your iOS devices).
وضع علامة مرجعية على الأية، والترجمة، والتفسير للرجوع إليها

● Quranic Aya and word highlighting during recitation.
تظليل الآية والكلمة أثناء التلاوة

● Social media sharing. Ability to share selected aya via email, twitter & Facebook.
مشاركة في وسائل الإعلام الاجتماعية

● iPad friendly interface
تطابق واجهة أيباد

Translate Voice is a useful translation application that provides you with real-time and accurate text, voice and image translation services. Whether you are studying, working or traveling, it can break the language barrier for you and allow you to communicate with the world without any barriers.

Main feature:

1. Multi-modal translation: text, voice, pictures, all available. Whether you are typing, speaking, or taking photos, AI translation experts can provide you with accurate and fast translations.

2.AI driven: Using the latest artificial intelligence technology, our translation engine can provide natural and smooth translations, making you feel like you are communicating directly with a native speaker.

3. Privacy protection: We respect and protect your privacy. All translation content will be processed on cloud servers, and we will not collect or share any personal privacy information.

iTranslator is your language companion that you can take with you wherever you go. Download iTranslator now and start your multilingual journey!

Welcome to the Dhikr & Dua app by Life With Allah, a da‘wah initiative of Ummah Welfare Trust.

A beautiful app with a stunning modern design to help you read dhikr and duas on a daily basis and on key occasions.

The app is totally FREE with NO annoying ads.

Wide Selection
The app features a collection of 500+ du‘ās and dhikr, each of them carefully assigned to a relevant category.

Easy Navigation
The app provides easy navigation through the various collections of duas & dhikr. Just swipe left and right to go to the next or previous dhikr & du‘a. Or go immediately to your preferred dhikr or du‘a by using the index page. 

Translation, Transliteration, Hadith/Virtue
Each dhikr and dua features the above so you can help you read and understand what you are reading. The explanation of each dua and dhikr is coming soon inshallah.

Audio
Running out of time? Find it difficult to read the Arabic? We’ve got you covered. Listen to each du‘a and dhikr individually or simply play the whole collection!

Articles
Over 100 articles on dhikr, dua, the Qur’an, ruqyah and more, for you to read from.

Emotions
Feeling anxious or angry? Confused or worried? You can now select whatever emotion you’re feeling and recite the du‘a related to it.

Daily Reminder
The daily reminders which are shared on our social media platforms will also be made available for users on the app. Simply go to the ‘Daily Reminder’ tab to view and share.

Share
Share your favourite dua or dhikr as text and also as an image.

Counter
Each dua or dhikr which needs to be recited multiple times will have a dedicated counter.
A separate stand-alone counter. Simple and easy to use. Just select the preset amounts or choose your custom amount and tap away!

Customisation
Find the Arabic hard to read? Is reading on a screen too difficult? You can change the font of the Arabic text to whatever suits you best. Audio too fast or too slow? Customise the speed of the audio to whatever you're most comfortable with.


Publications

【 Photo album 】

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

Also it allows you to download songs from your cloud storages. It supports Dropbox®.

It is easy to use and useful. You can enjoy listening to songs without wifi.

Main Features: 
√ Download songs from your cloud storages.
√ Play downloaded songs with a powerful player.
√ Play local iPod songs with a powerful player.
√ Provide 3 play modes: normal, single, shuffle.
√ Manage your playlists.

How to use:
1. On the tab 'Cloud' choose the cloud platform Dropbox.
2. Click the Sign In icon button at the right top corner of the cloud platform section.
3. Connect to Dropbox and use your account. (If you have no account, you should register one.)
4. Get songs from your cloud storage. (You should upload your preferred songs to your cloud storage by yourself.)
5. Choose a downloaded songs to play and enjoy it.
